services.title: Our Services
descriptions: Discover the full spectrum of digital services designed to help your business thrive. At Imboxsoft, we combine software development expertise with creative design thinking to deliver solutions that are both technically powerful and visually compelling.
Whether you're launching a new platform, streamlining internal operations, enhancing your online visibility, or building a brand from the ground up — our team is here to make it happen.
Explore our services below and find out how we turn ideas into impactful results.

softwareDevelopment.title: Software Development
softwareDevelopment.description: Boost your business through digital solutions with high development velocity and a skilled agile team — at the best possible costs.
softwareDevelopment.subtitle: Software solutions for your business
subtitleP: Support and consultancy in every stage of the project.
Team of skilled developers with 10+ years of coding experience.

design.title: Personalized Design
design.description: Every project is built around your vision. A great product comes from a strong identity. That's why we always begin by defining the best concept for your digital solution.

apps.title: Custom Full Stack Apps
apps.description: We are proficient in several technologies and tools. From presentation websites to fully customized apps — we can build anything tailored to your business needs.

websites.title: Presentation websites & e-commerce
websites.description: We have experience with tools like WordPress, Shopify, and BigCommerce. Based on your goals and budget, we'll recommend the best platform with optimal long-term performance.

api.title: Seamless integration with third-party APIs
api.description: If you need to extend your app by connecting to services like payment gateways, CRMs, ERPs, real-time data sync, or automated workflows (invoicing, emailing, delivery tracking), we're ready to help.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Optimization
maintenance.description: If your product needs improvements, we've got you covered. We'll diagnose any issues and provide optimal solutions. Every project includes a FREE maintenance period — take full advantage of it.

benefits.title: Benefits and uses
benefits.subtitle: Enhance your work with personalized apps
benefits.description: Let your business thrive through digital solutions, process automation, and logical organization.

results.title: Immediate results
results.description: We customize your business workflow in the shortest possible time.

prices.title: Lowest possible price
prices.description: We adapt pricing based on your goals — premium quality at a fair price.

meetings.title: Periodic meetings
meetings.description: You have full control during development. We schedule check-ins and notify you of milestones hit, and also when issues arise.

developers.title: Skilled developers
developers.description: Our company is new, but our team isn't. We bring over 10 years of coding experience — your project is in good hands.

web.title: Web, Mobile & Desktop
web.description: Not sure which platform suits your needs? Let's talk and choose the best direction for your project.

expertise.title: Technology expertise
expertise.description: As passionate developers, we strive to stay up-to-date with the latest tech trends. Below are the technologies we're most proficient in.

metrics.title: Your success metrics become ours
metrics.projects: completed projects in the past 2 years
metrics.clients: of our clients chose to continue with us

faq.q: Cum pot solicita o ofertă personalizată?
faq.a: Ne poți răspunde direct la acest email sau ne poți contacta la [număr de telefon] pentru o ofertă adaptată proiectului tău.

faq.q: Ce tipuri de lucrări sau produse oferiți?
faq.a: Oferim [listează pe scurt produsele/serviciile], adaptate atât pentru proiecte mari, cât și pentru lucrări punctuale.

faq.q: Care este aria de acoperire a serviciilor?
faq.a: Livrăm și lucrăm în toată țara, iar pentru proiecte complexe putem asigura deplasare la șantier.
Da, avem discounturi speciale pentru comenzile de volum sau contracte pe termen lung.

faq.q: În cât timp livrați sau finalizați lucrarea?
faq.a: Termenele variază în funcție de complexitate, dar în majoritatea cazurilor livrăm în [X] zile lucrătoare.
Putem trimite exemple din proiectele anterioare și referințe de la clienți reali.

itConsulting.title: IT Consulting
itConsulting.description: From strategy to execution — we help you make confident, future-proof technology choices.
itConsulting.subtitle: Build Smarter, Not Just Faster
subtitleP: At Imboxsoft, IT consulting is more than just advice — it's partnership.
Whether you're a startup planning your first product or a company modernizing legacy systems, we provide clear, actionable guidance to align technology with your business goals.

whatWeDo.description: Let your business thrive through digital solutions, process automation, and logical organization.

digital.description: Align business objectives with modern tech solutions.

architecture.description: Choose the right tools, frameworks, and platforms.

cloud.description: Move safely to scalable cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure).

automation.description: Identify bottlenecks and improve internal processes.

security.description: Ensure your systems are safe and regulation-compliant.

software.title: Software Vendor Evaluation
software.description: Need a CRM, ERP, or payment gateway? We'’'ll help you choose.

administration.title: Systems Administration Support
administration.description: We help manage and maintain your infrastructure, ensuring reliable operations, performance monitoring, user access control, and security compliance.

optimization.title: Process Optimization
optimization.description: We analyze your existing workflows and identify inefficiencies to streamline operations, automate repetitive tasks, and improve productivity across departments.

maintenance.title: IT Maintenance & Support
maintenance.description: From routine updates to troubleshooting and ongoing improvements — we keep your systems running smoothly so you can focus on business growth.

graphicDesign.title: Graphic Design
graphicDesign.description: From logos to full visual systems — we create sharp, scalable designs that resonate.
graphicDesign.subtitle: Great Design Makes Brands Unforgettable
subtitleP: We create design systems that align with your business goals, strengthen your brand, and help you connect with the right audience.
Whether you're building a new brand or upgrading an old one, we treat design as a core part of your strategy — not just decoration.
We work with startups, established businesses, personal brands, SaaS platforms, and more. Whether you need a new look or a design partner long-term — we're here.

list.synergy: Tech + Design Synergy — We understand development, so we design what works.
